trans-unit.source: Provides information about a user profile.

The ProfileInfo class is used to represent information about a user profile from the data store, including the last date and time when profile properties were retrieved or updated, the user name associated with the profile, and whether the profile is for an anonymous or authenticated user.

ProfileInfo objects are constructed and returned as part of a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> by the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> methods of a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>.
Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"></xref> object for a class that inherits the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"></xref> class.
This <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo?displayProperty=fullName> constructor is not intended to be used from your code.
Instead, use the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> objects are constructed and returned as part of a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> by the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> methods of a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>.
Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"></xref> class with the specified property values.

The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> object is used to represent information about a user profile from the data store, including the last date and time when profile properties were retrieved or updated, the user name associated with the profile, and whether the profile is for an anonymous or authenticated user.

<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> objects are constructed and returned as a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> by the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> methods of a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>.
The user name for the profile.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the profile is for an anonymous user; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate the profile is for an authenticated user.
The last date and time when the profile was read or updated.
The last date and time when the profile was updated.
The size of the profile information and values stored in the data source.
Gets whether the user name for the profile is anonymous.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user name for the profile is anonymous; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the last date and time when the profile was read or updated.
A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the last date and time when the profile was read or updated.
Gets the last date and time when the profile was updated.
A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the last date and time when the profile was updated.
Gets the size of the profile property names and values stored in the data source.

The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> calculates the size of the profile as the total size of the string and binary columns that store the profile property values and the column that stores the profile property names.
The size of the columns is determined using the SQL Server DATALENGTH function.
The size of the profile property names and values stored in the data source.
Gets the user name for the profile.
The user name for the profile.
